name: Frog-is FI-MC100
headline: Condenser gooseneck microphone for speech and conference
definition: Electret condenser gooseneck desktop microphone with balanced output and programmable control.
description: FI-MC100 is a standard-size electret condenser gooseneck microphone with a desktop base, designed for fast deployment in conference and multipurpose environments. It delivers clear speech reproduction with reliable operation in professional settings.
story: Built for situations where flexibility is essential, the FI-MC100 combines a desktop base with a long attached cable, making it ideal for rooms where permanent installation is impractical. Balanced output, logic control terminals, and clear LED indication ensure consistent, professional performance in meetings and presentations.
features: Wide dynamic range and frequency response for accurate speech reproduction
Interchangeable cartridges supporting different polar patterns
Balanced output for long cable runs with strong noise immunity
Programmable on/off switch with LED status indicator
High-visibility LED suitable for bright ambient lighting
Logic input and output terminals for remote control or automatic mixers

name: Frog-is FI-URM500
headline: USB digital condenser recording microphone
description: A professional USB condenser microphone with multi-pattern selection, designed for studio-quality recording, conferencing, podcasting, streaming, and gaming.
story: FI-URM500 combines studio-grade condenser capsules with high-quality A/D conversion, offering true plug-and-play recording without the need for audio interfaces. Its selectable polar patterns and wide sampling rates make it versatile for creators and professionals alike.
definition: USB digital condenser microphone with multi-pattern selection and integrated audio interface.
features: 4 polar patterns: Cardioid, Figure-8, Stereo, Omnidirectional
specs: Operating Systems: Windows / Mac / Linux / Android

name: Frog-is FI-VOX2
headline: Dynamic super-cardioid vocal microphone
description: A rugged, high-performance dynamic vocal microphone designed for speech and vocals with excellent feedback rejection.
story: FI-VOX2 is engineered for demanding stage use. Its super-cardioid pickup pattern minimizes spill and feedback, while extended high-frequency response and presence boost ensure clarity even at high on-stage sound levels.
definition: Dynamic super-cardioid microphone for vocals and speech.
features: Shock-mounted capsule for low handling noise

name: Frog-is FI-VOX3
headline: Dynamic super-cardioid microphone with On/Off switch
description: A stage-ready super-cardioid vocal microphone with integrated On/Off switch for flexible live use.
story: FI-VOX3 builds on the FI-VOX2 platform with the addition of an On/Off switch, making it ideal for presenters and performers who require direct control during live events.
definition: Dynamic super-cardioid vocal microphone with integrated switch.

name: Frog-is FI-INS1
headline: Cardioid condenser instrument microphone
description: A compact cardioid condenser microphone designed for demanding instrument recording and live performance.
story: FI-INS1 delivers fast transient response, high SPL handling, and a wide frequency range in a compact form. It is optimized for accurate reproduction of acoustic instruments in both live and studio environments.
